Source code for anysection.gauss_tables


[docs]
class GaussTables:


[docs]
    @staticmethod
    def get_gauss_points(n):
        """
        Returns Gauss points and weights for n-point integration.
        
        Parameters:
            n (int): Number of Gauss points (1 to 10 supported).
        
        Returns:
            tuple: (list of points, list of weights)
        """
        gauss_data = {
            1: ([0.0], [2.0]),
            2: ([-0.5773502692, 0.5773502692], [1.0, 1.0]),
            3: ([-0.7745966692, 0.0, 0.7745966692], [0.5555555555, 0.8888888888, 0.5555555555]),
            4: ([-0.8611363116, -0.3399810435, 0.3399810435, 0.8611363116], 
                [0.3478548451, 0.6521451548, 0.6521451548, 0.3478548451]),
            5: ([-0.9061798459, -0.5384693101, 0.0, 0.5384693101, 0.9061798459],
                [0.2369268850, 0.4786286705, 0.5688888889, 0.4786286705, 0.2369268850]),
            6: ([-0.9324695142, -0.6612093865, -0.2386191861, 
                  0.2386191861, 0.6612093865, 0.9324695142],
                [0.1713244924, 0.3607615730, 0.4679139346, 
                 0.4679139346, 0.3607615730, 0.1713244924]),
            7: ([-0.9491079123, -0.7415311856, -0.4058451514, 
                  0.0, 0.4058451514, 0.7415311856, 0.9491079123],
                [0.1294849662, 0.2797053915, 0.3818300505, 
                 0.4179591837, 0.3818300505, 0.2797053915, 0.1294849662]),
            8: ([-0.9602898565, -0.7966664774, -0.5255324099, -0.1834346425,
                  0.1834346425, 0.5255324099, 0.7966664774, 0.9602898565],
                [0.1012285363, 0.2223810345, 0.3137066459, 0.3626837834,
                 0.3626837834, 0.3137066459, 0.2223810345, 0.1012285363]),
            9: ([-0.9681602395, -0.8360311073, -0.6133714327, -0.3242534234, 0.0,
                  0.3242534234, 0.6133714327, 0.8360311073, 0.9681602395],
                [0.0812743884, 0.1806481607, 0.2606106964, 0.3123470770, 0.3302393550,
                 0.3123470770, 0.2606106964, 0.1806481607, 0.0812743884]),
            10: ([-0.9739065285, -0.8650633666, -0.6794095682, -0.4333953941, -0.1488743389,
                   0.1488743389, 0.4333953941, 0.6794095682, 0.8650633666, 0.9739065285],
                 [0.0666713443, 0.1494513491, 0.2190863625, 0.2692667193, 0.2955242247,
                  0.2955242247, 0.2692667193, 0.2190863625, 0.1494513491, 0.0666713443])
        }

        if n in gauss_data:
            return gauss_data[n]
        else:
            raise ValueError("Unsupported number of Gauss points (1-10 supported).")
